docs.title: How Do I

docs.text: MkDocs I use MkDocs with Material theme . Development environment is managed by pyenv-virtualenv and is activated if we are in the project directory. To start development server run mkdocs serve . When happy with the result, just push to master and CI will update live website.
docs.title: MkDocs

docs.text: I use MkDocs with Material theme . Development environment is managed by pyenv-virtualenv and is activated if we are in the project directory. To start development server run mkdocs serve . When happy with the result, just push to master and CI will update live website.
docs.title: MkDocs

docs.text: Tmux Run tmux to start tmux. Commands All commands are prefixed by Ctrl + A . Command Description % Split current pane vertically. z Toggle pane zoom (useful for copying). Up / Right / Down / Left Switch to different pane. x Kill the current pane. [ Enter scroll mode (press q to quit). c Create new window. , Rename window. 1 / 2 / 3 / ... Switch window.
docs.title: Tmux
